title: [Question] Food in Skm mess
content: Is it possible to get subscription for only dinner.,i live in pg. How is the food there

comments.body: Ya it is , u have to pay like 5k something for a month and then u can get it , but tbh its trash lol /s
I think you can get it at the Food court mess too. FC Dinner's are pretty good
u won't get subscription only for dinner.
